title: Episode 312: Banned From the Neighborhood (Feat. Pressa)
itunes:title: Episode 312: Banned From the Neighborhood (Feat. Pressa)
description:
Canadian rapper, Pressa joins the ladies of Lip Service to promote his latest single "Second Hand Smoke," as well as the deluxe version to his recent album "Gardner Express." Pressa gushed when discussing his love for Coi Leray, alluding to the fact they've discussed marriage and having a family, as well as meeting each other's families. Pressa also opened up about the struggles he faced his entire childhood, for example, growing up while his father is in jail for murder. On a lighter note, he claims he can take any rapper in basketball, why he has no tattoos, and much more. Enjoy!

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
